commit message:
Update issue 1916
Added non-breaking spaces (\u00A0) for quoting/question/exclamation marks, colons
Switched to UNIX line ending style

Hopefully fixed an error in the chinese translation.

Fixes issue 1987.

added  English to the language options, which foolishly wasn't included in the list of native language names

Update issue 1988
Status: Started
Owner: thialfihar
You are absolutely right, English was not displayed for anyone. Oops. Added now, so it'll be in the next build.

added text selection via 'long press' in MessageView, also giving a notification for when text selection starts

Update issue 662
Added the long press initiation of text selection. I also noticed we'll have to make sure text selection is not recognized as a gesture (or at least ignored as gesture).

ignore gestures during text selection

Fixes issue 662

remember which message was selected in MessageList in case the list changes while the dialog is up

Fixes issue 906
isRing -> shouldRing so that the code reads sanely

Don't construct a listenerset clone if we don't need to.
danapple++ suggested the optimization

since we're checking seen status within the notify method, (first thing,
even), we don't need to do it in the caller code.

Rather than doing a full count of all the unread messages in each and
every folder for each message downloaded in a session, factor the
'unread messages' count out into the calling code.  It's slightly less
clean, but a pretty huge performance gain.

Fixes issue 1443
At the end of header sync reset the counts.

back out the rest of my localDate changes for now due to user
complaints.
